trans-unit.source: Provides Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) statistical data.
trans-unit.target: 提供傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 統計資料。

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPGlobalProperties.GetTcpIPv4Statistics%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPGlobalProperties.GetTcpIPv6Statistics%2A> methods, to give applications access to TCP traffic information.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的執行個體所傳回<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPGlobalProperties.GetTcpIPv4Statistics%2A>和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPGlobalProperties.GetTcpIPv6Statistics%2A>方法，讓應用程式存取 TCP 流量的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The information in this class correlates to the management information objects described in [http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2012.txt](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2012.txt).
trans-unit.target: 這個類別中的資訊與相互關聯中所述的管理資訊物件[ http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2012.txt ](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2012.txt)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the TCP statistics for the specified address family.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示指定的位址系列的 TCP 統計資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpStatistics" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpStatistics" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpStatistics> class.
trans-unit.target: 可以呼叫這個建構函式只能由衍生自的<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpStatistics>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of accepted Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 取得已接受的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線要求數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of TCP connection requests accepted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定已接受的 TCP 連線要求總數。

trans-unit.source: IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the SYN-RCVD state from the LISTEN state."
trans-unit.target: IETF RFC 2012 正式定義此值為"次數 TCP 連線對直接轉換收到的同步處理狀態從待命狀態。 」

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays connection information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示連接資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connection requests made by clients.
trans-unit.target: 取得用戶端所提出的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線要求數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of TCP connections initiated by clients.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定用戶端所啟始的 TCP 連線總數。

trans-unit.source: IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the SYN-SENT state from the CLOSED state."
trans-unit.target: IETF RFC 2012 正式定義此值為"次數 TCP 連線對直接轉換 SYN 傳送的狀態從關閉的狀態。 」

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays connection information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示連接資訊。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the total number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connections established.
trans-unit.target: 指定已建立的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線總數。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of connections established.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定已建立的連線總數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays connection information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示連接資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of current Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connections.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of current TCP connections.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定目前的 TCP 連線總數。

trans-unit.source: IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of TCP connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT."
trans-unit.target: IETF RFC 2012 正式定義此值為"TCP 連線的目前狀態是 ESTABLISHED 或關閉等候的數目。 」

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays connection information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示連接資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) errors received.
trans-unit.target: 取得已收到的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 錯誤數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of TCP errors received.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定已收到的 TCP 錯誤總數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays connection information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示連接資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of failed Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 取得已失敗的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線嘗試數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of failed TCP connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定已失敗的 TCP 連線嘗試總數。

trans-unit.source: IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the CLOSED state from either the SYN-SENT state or the SYN-RCVD state, plus the number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the LISTEN state from the SYN-RCVD state."
trans-unit.target: IETF RFC 2012 正式定義此值為"次數 TCP 連線已直接轉換為已關閉狀態從 SYN 傳送狀態或收到的同步處理狀態，再加上的 TCP 連線對直接轉換接聽的次數狀態從收到的同步處理狀態。 」

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays connection information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示連接資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of supported Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connections.
trans-unit.target: 取得支援的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of TCP connections that can be supported.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定可支援的 TCP 連線總數。

trans-unit.source: If the maximum number of connections is dynamic, this property returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果最大連接數目是動態的這個屬性會傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays time-out and maximum connection information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示逾時和最大的連接資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum retransmission time-out value for Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments.
trans-unit.target: 取得傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 區段的最大重新傳輸逾時值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the maximum number of milliseconds permitted by a TCP implementation for the retransmission time-out value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定 TCP 實作允許之重新傳輸逾時值的最大毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: TCP starts a retransmission timer when each outbound segment is passed to the network layer (IP).
trans-unit.target: 每個輸出區段傳遞到網路層級 (IP) 時，TCP 會啟動重新傳輸計時器。

trans-unit.source: If no acknowledgement is received for the data in the segment before the timer expires, the segment is retransmitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果未收到收條區段中資料的計時器到期之前，會重新傳輸區段。

trans-unit.source: The timer can be set to any value between the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpStatistics.MinimumTransmissionTimeout%2A> value and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpStatistics.MaximumTransmissionTimeout%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 計時器可以設為之間的任何值<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpStatistics.MinimumTransmissionTimeout%2A>值和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpStatistics.MaximumTransmissionTimeout%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays time-out and maximum connection information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示逾時和最大的連接資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum retransmission time-out value for Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments.
trans-unit.target: 取得傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 區段的最小重新傳輸逾時值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the minimum number of milliseconds permitted by a TCP implementation for the retransmission time-out value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定 TCP 實作允許之重新傳輸逾時值的最小毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: TCP starts a retransmission timer when each outbound segment is passed to the network layer (IP).
trans-unit.target: 每個輸出區段傳遞到網路層級 (IP) 時，TCP 會啟動重新傳輸計時器。

trans-unit.source: If no acknowledgement is received for the data in the segment before the timer expires, the segment is retransmitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果未收到收條區段中資料的計時器到期之前，會重新傳輸區段。

trans-unit.source: The timer The timer can be set to any value between the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpStatistics.MinimumTransmissionTimeout%2A> value and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpStatistics.MaximumTransmissionTimeout%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 計時器可以設為之間的任何值計時器<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpStatistics.MinimumTransmissionTimeout%2A>值和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpStatistics.MaximumTransmissionTimeout%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays time-out and maximum connection information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示逾時和最大的連接資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of RST packets received by Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connections.
trans-unit.target: 取得傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線已收到的 RST 封包數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of reset TCP connections.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定重設 TCP 連線的總數。

trans-unit.source: IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the CLOSED state from either the ESTABLISHED state or the CLOSE-WAIT state."
trans-unit.target: IETF RFC 2012 正式定義此值為"次數 TCP 連線已直接轉換為已關閉狀態從 ESTABLISHED 狀態或關閉等候狀態。 」

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays connection information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示連接資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments sent with the reset flag set.
trans-unit.target: 取得已傳送且設定了重設旗標的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 區段數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of TCP segments sent with the reset flag set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定已傳送且設定了重設旗標的 TCP 區段總數。

trans-unit.source: TCP resets are specified using the reset (RST) control bit in the TCP header.
trans-unit.target: 使用重設 (RST) 控制位元的 TCP 標頭中指定 TCP 重設。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays segment information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示片段資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments received.
trans-unit.target: 取得已收到的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 區段數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of TCP segments received.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定已收到的 TCP 區段總數。

trans-unit.source: This data includes segments with errors and segments received on currently established connections.
trans-unit.target: 此資料包含具有錯誤的區段和目前建立的連接上收到的區段。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays segment information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示片段資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments re-sent.
trans-unit.target: 取得已重新傳送的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 區段數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of TCP segments retransmitted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定已重新傳送的 TCP 區段總數。

trans-unit.source: TCP segments that are not acknowledged as being received at the destination are retransmitted.
trans-unit.target: 不會認可為在目的地所收到的 TCP 區段會重新傳送。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays segment information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示片段資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments sent.
trans-unit.target: 取得已傳送的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 區段數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that specifies the total number of TCP segments sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值，指定已傳送的 TCP 區段總數。

trans-unit.source: This data includes segments sent for currently established connections but does not include segments containing only retransmitted octets.
trans-unit.target: 這項資料會包含目前已建立連線所傳送的區段，但不包含區段包含只重新傳輸的八位元。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays segment information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示片段資訊。
